txt.en: Bring the Orc-orders to Hetbrúda near Tholmuzog
Bat-rider sentries can be found south-west of Búshatap in Máttugard.\n\nYou should defeat any bat-rider sentries that you find.

You give Hetbrúda the Orc-orders to read, and she scowls.

'These Orc-orders are difficult to read, both because of the language in which they are written and also because of this hand-writing... it's terrible!

'They all say something about protecting the Deepscrave from intruders and establishing a barricade. I presume that Tholmuzog is the barricade, and that we must be the intruders.'
Hetbrúda can be found near Tholmuzog.\n\nYou should bring the Orc-orders to Hetbrúda.
Tholmuzog can be found north-west of Búshatap in Máttugard.\n\nYou should locate Tholmuzog.

'I was thinking some more about these bat-riders. If there are goblins here in Máttugard, there are probably Orcs too! We should search for an Orc presence here and defeat any more bat-riders that we find on the way!'
Orcs hide in darkness, waiting to ambush those in the upper reaches of Máttugard.
Tholmuzog can be found north-west of Búshatap in Máttugard.\n\nYou should defeat Orcs and trolls at Tholmuzog and discover what they plan to do in Máttugard.
A vast Orc encampment hides in the shadows of Máttugard
